mainText.attr1: You can assign ships to guard one or more objects.
Only ships or stations can be guarded.
Guard orders have nothing to do with formations.
Ships will target attackers of guarded objects, even if they are set to Do Not Engage
Right click on an object to guard
Left click and hold - draw a selection rectangle around friendly objects
Release left mouse button to confirm
Select ship or ships - click 'Clear Targets' or 'Clear Orders'
When ships don't have a target of their own, and are set to guard an object. They will check if the guarded object is under attack and then try to locate its attackers.
You can designate multiple ships to be repaired via the guard command. The repair ship will check the status of those ships and continue repairing them as needed.
